title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Lockheed Harpoon PV 2  - Version 1.0
description:
In this video we will look at the Lockheed Harpoon PV2 which has been released earlier today. The aircraft is ported from FSX and still has some issues like most  FSX ported aircrafts which will hopefully be fixed in the future. The good thing is you can fly with it although you cannot start completely from scratch at this moment. 

If you also want to give this aircraft a try download your own copy from:
https://flightsim.to/file/22742/lockheed-harpoon-pv-2
